Description: LogSquash automatically compresses and consolidates logs before SIEM ingestion, reducing volume by up to 90% while retaining 100% of the data. It performs automatic log grouping of contextually related entries, deduplication of redundant values, and schema normalization to SIEM-optimized formats (ECS, CEF, CIM, OCSF). Deploys natively with forwarders like Splunk Forwarder and Cribl Stream with zero pipeline engineering required.
